Description: Allow users to browse and search for books
Acceptance Criteria: Users can browse and search for books

Description: Allow users to purchase books online
Provide book recommendations based on user preferences
Acceptance Criteria: Users get book recommendations based on their preferences

Summary: Track orders and view purchase history
Description: Allow users to track their orders and view their purchase history
Acceptance Criteria: Users can track their orders and view their purchase history
System can handle at least 50 concurrent users

Description: Respond to user requests within 2 seconds
Acceptance Criteria: System responds to user requests within 2 seconds

Description: Be secure and protect user data
Acceptance Criteria: System is secure and protects user data
